value.latex: Soit $U$ un ouvert d'un espace vectoriel norm{\'e}. Montrer que $\overline{\mathring{\overline U}} = \overline U$.
value.html: Soit \(U\) un ouvert d’un espace vectoriel normé. Montrer que \(\overline{\mathring{\overline U}} = \overline U\).

value.latex:
$\mathring{\overline U} \subset \overline U  \Rightarrow  \overline{\mathring{\overline U}} \subset \overline U$.\par
$U \subset \overline U  \Rightarrow  U \subset \mathring{\overline U}  \Rightarrow  \overline U \subset \overline{\mathring{\overline U}}$.
value.html:
\(\mathring{\overline U} \subset \overline U \Rightarrow \overline{\mathring{\overline U}} \subset \overline U\).

\(U \subset \overline U \Rightarrow U \subset \mathring{\overline U} \Rightarrow \overline U \subset \overline{\mathring{\overline U}}\).
